title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 838.3 - Request for existing records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 838.3 - Request for existing records

State Regulations
(a) Any written request to the Commission for existing records not prepared for
routine distribution to the public shall be deemed to be a request for records
pursuant to the provisions of this subchapter, whether or not the provisions of
this subchapter are mentioned in the request, and shall be governed by the
provisions of this subchapter. (b) Records or documents prepared by the commission for routine public
distribution, e.g., pamphlets, speeches, public information and educational
materials, shall be furnished free of charge upon request as long as the supply
lasts. The provisions of this Part shall not be applicable to such
requests. (c) All existing
commission records are subject to routine destruction according to standard
record retention schedules. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21

838.3

New

York State Register July 17, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 29, eff. 7/22/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
